# Software packages

- [Rqc](http://bioconductor.org/packages/Rqc/) is an optimised tool designed for
quality control and assessment of high-throughput sequencing data. It performs
parallel processing of entire files and produces a report which contains a set
of high-resolution graphics.
- [GA4GHclient](https://github.com/labbcb/GA4GHclient) provides an easy way to
access public data servers through Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
(GA4GH) Genomics API. This package also provides an interactive web application.
